website_summaries.verdict: Hands down the best when it comes to durability, comfort and reliability. If you want a reusable model that's made to work and last, this is your best pick.
pros: With its activated carbon filtration system, soft material, and easy-to-adjust fit, this reusable and washable mask is an ideal choice for consumers who need reliable dust protection
cons: Fit may be a bit snug on some individuals
The nose band may be uncomfortable for some

customer_reviews.title: Seasonal allergies will not keep me from running anymore
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it because i experienced allergy symptoms immediately after running outside. When running with this mask on, I did not suffer from any allergy symptom at all! The one problem I have is that it keeps slipping down my face. So keep having to pull it up. If anyone have any ideas on how to keep it from slipping, please let me know. My daughter told me that I look like Spider-Man when I had it on. So now I'm looking for a Spider-Man beanie to complement the look😹
customer_reviews.author: Shinta

customer_reviews.title: Solved the problem of my husband’s allergies from mowing the lawn. No more coughing!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this in red for mowing the lawn. He used to get a bad cough after mowing due to allergies. He hasn’t had any problems after switching from disposable masks to this one. I like that he can rinse the sweat/dirt out of it and that it doesn’t leave marks on his face. He says it doesn’t get as stuffy as the disposable masks. I’m so glad we came across this mask.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: It helps with dust and pollen. However the fit is a bit uncomfortable and tends to slide down,
customer_reviews.author: Arc

customer_reviews.title: Big problem solver regarding allergies
customer_reviews.text: Can breathe okay and fits nicely. I have allergies causing sinus infections resulting from mowing my yard. Could not wear the paper masks because I could not breath through them. This one works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Frances G. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Works in "The worst smog area ever"
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this while working over seas in Afghanistan in a smoggy area. This mask worked great!!! So I can say its Afghan certified!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Michael

customer_reviews.title: Husband approved!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my husband who works in construction. He absolutely loved the unique design and quality of protection!
customer_reviews.author: Mikki

customer_reviews.title: Must have if you have allergies!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome mask! I have allergies and whenever I dust, my nose becomes runny. This mask has done wonder for my nose and I'm no longer having runny nose whenever I dust. Great mask!
customer_reviews.author: gogohobby

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 mask. The red one for my wife. Mine came with extra filter and for same price hers didn't. UPDATE: They said they will make good on what I didn't get. Waiting to see wtill update later.
customer_reviews.author: Harpo

customer_reviews.title: This helps so much with my allergies, I do ...
customer_reviews.text: This helps so much with my allergies, I do wish it had a bit less of a smell from the cloth choice.
customer_reviews.author: P4UL

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My mother experiences a lot of difficulties breathing, especially when the air is bad, so we got her this mask. It arrived quickly, is comfortable to wear and, most importantly, it works. My mom is able to go out and walk or play in the garden no matter the air outside. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hoggan

customer_reviews.title: Had terrible problem with allergies and all went away using the ...
customer_reviews.text: And it gives you a little resistance so it helps you with purifying the air and making you stronger. Had terrible problem with allergies and all went away using the mask.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mist for lawncare
customer_reviews.text: The mask lets me cut the grass with out sneezing and having to use allergy medicine thanks for this product
customer_reviews.author: Cotto

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit comfortably, difficult to breath and size is small. Wouldn't recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: KEMO RICHARDSON

customer_reviews.title: Great for allergies
customer_reviews.text: Works wonders for allergies. I can cut grass again without symptoms.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Airflow isn't enough!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the mask so that it could be used while riding a bike in Los Angeles. The airflow simply isn't enough, and I quickly found myself struggling to breath using it. Maybe it's fine to use it while walking, but definitely not for any activity that requires more breathing. Also it is manufactured in China so I could not help but wonder what if any of the smells I was breathing with it were toxic. I ended up throwing it away.
customer_reviews.author: CoffeeDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Painful, ill effective and poorly fitted.
customer_reviews.text: This mask leaves calluses even after just wearing it for 30 minutes. Fillteration would good, if the mask actually metthe chin and had a desent grip. Metal nose peice is not malable whatsoever and the mask would press any existing nose to your face and still wouldn't stay on. Would never buy again, would recomend to no one and would advise the seller to keep the filters and toss the rest of the mask.
customer_reviews.author: Product Holic

customer_reviews.title: The breather valve is very useful to me it works well indoors and outdoors whe ...
customer_reviews.text: The breather valve is very useful to me it works well indoors and outdoors whe I clean the breather valve keeps away smlls it is good for people who has
customer_reviews.author: Amaozn Customer

customer_reviews.title: No better than then the cheap hardware store ones.
customer_reviews.text: No better than just getting the cheap throw away ones at the local hardware store. Small in size. Seems like you have to wash it after every use. Wouldn't buy again..
customer_reviews.author: b paul

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy, unless you cant afford better.
customer_reviews.text: It was decent, but could've been better. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Railey Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Allergies gone as soon as it's on
customer_reviews.text: Well made, comfortable, helps me to deal with allergies at home. Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gio G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good stuff to city's with high levels of pollution specially if you ride board or bicycle
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does a nice job but puts a lot of pressure on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Does a nice job but puts a lot of pressure on the bridge of your nose and will fog your glasses up pretty bad within minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Very good mask and overall build quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good mask and overall build quality. It's a bit small for my otherwise relatively normal sized head, but whatever. Stays secure and fits snuggly once on. Easily the best of this type of item I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Pirate_Joke
